name: POSTHOG__CAPTURE_EVENT
description: Capture custom events with properties for user behavior tracking and analytics

event.description: Name of the event to track

distinct_id.description: Unique identifier for the user or session

properties.description: Custom properties associated with the event

timestamp.description: ISO timestamp when the event occurred (optional, defaults to current time)

name: POSTHOG__GET_EVENTS
description: Retrieve events from PostHog with filtering and pagination for analysis

project_id.description: Project ID to get events from

distinct_id.description: Filter by specific user distinct ID

limit.description: Maximum number of events to return

offset.description: Number of events to skip for pagination

name: POSTHOG__CREATE_FEATURE_FLAG
description: Create a feature flag to control feature rollouts and A/B testing experiments

project_id.description: Project ID to create feature flag in

key.description: Unique key for the feature flag

name.description: Human-readable name for the feature flag

groups.description: Groups of users to target with different rollout percentages

active.description: Whether the feature flag is active

name: POSTHOG__LIST_FEATURE_FLAGS
description: List all feature flags in a project with their current status and configuration

project_id.description: Project ID to list feature flags from

limit.description: Maximum number of feature flags to return

offset.description: Number of feature flags to skip for pagination

name: POSTHOG__UPDATE_FEATURE_FLAG
description: Update an existing feature flag's configuration, rollout percentage, or targeting rules

project_id.description: Project ID containing the feature flag

name.description: Updated name for the feature flag

active.description: Whether the feature flag is active

name: POSTHOG__DELETE_FEATURE_FLAG
description: Delete a feature flag from the project permanently

project_id.description: Project ID containing the feature flag

name: POSTHOG__CREATE_COHORT
description: Create a user cohort based on events and properties for targeted analysis and feature flags

project_id.description: Project ID to create cohort in

groups.description: Groups of conditions that define the cohort

is_static.description: Whether this is a static cohort (doesn't update automatically)

name: POSTHOG__LIST_COHORTS
description: List all cohorts in a project with their definitions and member counts

project_id.description: Project ID to list cohorts from

name: POSTHOG__CREATE_DASHBOARD
description: Create a new dashboard to organize insights and visualizations for data analysis

project_id.description: Project ID to create dashboard in

is_shared.description: Whether the dashboard is shared with team members

name: POSTHOG__LIST_DASHBOARDS
description: List all dashboards in a project with their metadata and tile counts

project_id.description: Project ID to list dashboards from

limit.description: Maximum number of dashboards to return

offset.description: Number of dashboards to skip for pagination

name: POSTHOG__CREATE_INSIGHT
description: Create a new insight (chart/analysis) to visualize data trends, funnels, retention, or paths

project_id.description: Project ID to create insight in

description.description: Description of what the insight shows

events.description: Events to analyze in the insight

name: POSTHOG__GET_SESSION_RECORDINGS
description: Get session recordings to analyze user behavior and identify UX issues

project_id.description: Project ID to get recordings from

distinct_id.description: Filter by specific user distinct ID

date_from.description: Get recordings from this date onwards

date_to.description: Get recordings up to this date

duration_type_filter.description: Type of duration filter to apply

limit.description: Maximum number of recordings to return

offset.description: Number of recordings to skip for pagination
